content: sew on 2 sides of carrier lanyard loop chain 19 20 - sew both ends together on 1 side of carrier side handle sew to top of base row and top of carrier height 3 inch - chain 15 14 4 inch - chain 19 18 5 inch - chain 24 23 6 inch - chain 28 27 7 inch - chain 33 32 8 inch - chain 37 36 1 leaving a long tail for sewing make desired chain half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook half_double_crochet in each chain turn 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in each st 3 working on the other side of the starting chain attach yarn half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in each st along turn 4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet in each st along cut yarn leave a long tail for sewing 5 optional attach yarn into starting chain space slip_stitch along chain spaces cut yarn and sew in ends ©buttonnose crochet for full support please contact me via my facebook page buttonnose crochet 4 sew on handle you can decorate however you like maybe add flowers where you attach the strap to the top or add ribbon around the top row of the body i hope you have enjoyed this free pattern by buttonnose crochet please feel free to share your makes but please give credit to me as the designer follow me on facebook or instagram ©buttonnose crochet for full support please contact me via my facebook page buttonnose crochet 5
